message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it's really valuable,  how about $120 to start?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $90 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $110?
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $95
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to get at least $105 for this.  It's my final offer.
I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $92
